topic.title: Moving/Renaming Resources in the NavigatorProject View

body.p: The Project view allows you to move or rename a file from the current project.

In case the Update references of the moved resource(s) option is enabled, a Preview option which opens the Preview dialog is available for both actions. The Preview dialog presents a list with the resources that are updated.
body.note: The support to update references is available for XML, XML Schema, XSLT, Relax NG, and WSDL documents.
